p: In addition, the pathway for the mobilization of EPCs from the bone marrow (BM) in sepsis or septic shock is still unknown. Emerging evidence suggests that stromal-cell-derived factor 1a (SDF-1a) mediates the migration of hematopoietic stem cells from BM to peripheral blood (PB), while hypoxia inducible factor 1 (HIF-1), which regulates SDF-1a expression, is the central mediator of the cellular response to hypoxic microenvironments [ 16].
